name: Invoyce
description: A smart invoicing solution built for Africa's growing freelance community. Our platform helps freelancers create professional invoices, streamline payment collection, and maintain clear payment records. Designed with simplicity in mind, Invoyce makes financial management effortless for freelancers across Africa and beyond.

name: SnapBounty
description: A decentralized Web3 marketplace platform powered by Base blockchain. Users can discover and complete bounties, share content, and earn rewards through secure on-chain transactions.

name: Solxlog
description: A blockchain transaction logging and monitoring platform for Solana. Track, analyze, and visualize on-chain activities with real-time data and intuitive insights.

name: Envsane
description: A lightweight CLI tool for validating and comparing environment files. Catch missing variables, empty values, case mismatches, and duplicates before deployment. Configuration-free and language-agnostic.

name: Dotzee
description: Intuitive State Management for React. A Pinia-inspired state management solution combining Vue's reactivity system with React's component model for intuitive, type-safe state management.

name: Seams & Status
description: A smart invoicing solution built for Africa's growing freelance community. Our platform helps freelancers create professional invoices, streamline payment collection, and maintain clear payment records. Designed with simplicity in mind, Invoyce makes financial management effortless for freelancers across Africa and beyond.

name: GasTracka
description: A Progressive Web App that allows users to track their gas prices for various major blockchains.

name: ResuMate
description: A comprehensive resume templating web application that empowers users to create polished and professional resumes effortlessly.

name: GreenGrow
description: Smart Farming Solutions for a Sustainable Future. Revolutionize your agricultural practices with IoT sensors and data analytics that increase yields while reducing resource consumption.

name: ShopWithSteeze
description: Shop with Steeze, where sophistication meets style. Discover our exquisite collection of men's jewelry, meticulously crafted to elevate your everyday look.

name: 10k MRR
description: A one-page dashboard for a SaaS product that allows showcase their product and track their revenue, customers, and other metrics.

name: Trivia
description: A simple quiz app with varieties of sections including politics, geography, arts, philosophy etc.

name: Tenzie
description: A tenzie web based browser game built to practice basic react state. Players roll the dice until its all the same number on all available dies. Best time and no. of rolls are saved to local storage.

name: BookWormz
description: An open book library where users can search for books, read books, download and download them.

name: Movie Pitch
description: A simple AI web app done with openaiAPI. Users would input a single sentence for a movie and they would get back a movie title, synopsis, actors and even a poster.
